thread.section_title: WSJ. Magazine – Fashion, Travel, Design, Art, Culture, Food, Living
thread.title: WSJ. Magazine Editor’s Letter: Window on the World

author: Kristina O’Neill
title: WSJ. Magazine Editor’s Letter: Window on the World
text:
In our annual Style & Design issue, we revisit some wide-reaching, perennial questions. What does style mean today? How is design changing our lives? The answers are different every year but always thought-provoking.
Gisele Bündchen’s name is virtually synonymous with style. One of the most successful supermodels ever, she’s a fixture of the fashion world and has had contracts with everyone from Victoria’s Secret to Versace. But she claims that her husband, New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady, is the real fashionista....
